nodes.documentation:
The DebtKernel is the hub of all business logic governing how and when
debt orders can be filled and cancelled.  All logic that determines
whether a debt order is valid & consensual is contained herein,
as well as the mechanisms that transfer fees to keepers and
principal payments to debtors.
 * Author: Nadav Hollander -- Github: nadavhollander
nodes.name: DebtKernel

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (address[6] memory,uint256[8] memory,bytes32[1] memory) view returns (struct DebtKernel.DebtOrder memory)
function (struct DebtKernel.DebtOrder memory,address,uint8[3] memory,bytes32[3] memory,bytes32[3] memory) returns (bool)
function (address[6] memory,uint256[8] memory,bytes32[1] memory) view returns (struct DebtKernel.DebtOrder memory)

nodes.documentation:
The DebtKernel is the hub of all business logic governing how and when
debt orders can be filled and cancelled.  All logic that determines
whether a debt order is valid & consensual is contained herein,
as well as the mechanisms that transfer fees to keepers and
principal payments to debtors.
 * Author: Nadav Hollander -- Github: nadavhollander
nodes.name: DebtKernel

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (address[6] memory,uint256[8] memory,bytes32[1] memory) view returns (struct DebtKernel.DebtOrder memory)
function (struct DebtKernel.DebtOrder memory,address,uint8[3] memory,bytes32[3] memory,bytes32[3] memory) returns (bool)
function (address[6] memory,uint256[8] memory,bytes32[1] memory) view returns (struct DebtKernel.DebtOrder memory)

pause().details: called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

unpause().details: called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state

cancelDebtOrder(address[6],uint256[8],by.notice: Allows a debtor to cancel a debt order before it's been filled -- preventing any counterparty from filling it in the future.

cancelIssuance(address,address,address,b.notice: Allows both underwriters and debtors to prevent a debt issuance in which they're involved from being used in a future debt order.

fillDebtOrder(address,address[6],uint256.notice: Fills a given debt order if it is valid and consensual.

setDebtToken(address).notice: Allows contract owner to set the currently used debt token contract. Function exists to maximize upgradeability of individual modules in the entire system.
